basic.title: Basic registration flow
basic.desc: A basic user record will be created in the Okta universal directory. The user will be authenticated immediately.

appProvisioning.title: Registration with Salesforce provisioning
appProvisioning.desc: A user record will be created in the Okta universal directory, and the user will be provisioned to Salesforce Chatter. User will be authenticated immediately.

withMFA.title: MFA Registration flow
withMFA.desc: A user record will be created in the Okta universal directory. An activation email will be sent to the user. The user must use a 2nd factor when they authenticate.
withMFA.thankYouMsg01: Thank you for registering with us
withMFA.thankYouMsg02: Please check your inbox for an activation email to complete your registration.

withEmail.title: Email verification user flow
withEmail.desc: A user record will be created in the Okta universal directory. The user must verify their email address before they can authenticate.
withEmail.shortDesc: User must verify their email address
withEmail.thankYouMsg01: Thank you for registering with us!
withEmail.thankYouMsg02: Please check your inbox for an activation email to complete your registration.

provisional.title: Provisional registration
provisional.desc: A user will be created in an inactive state in the Okta universal directory. An admin must review the user record and manually activate (invite) the user.
provisional.shortDesc: User must be approved by admin
provisional.thankYouMsg01: Thank you for registering with us
provisional.thankYouMsg02: You will receive an activation email after your registration has been reviewed.
